list.name: selected_value
list.label: Task
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' ->> 'taskName' AS __value
FROM cdviz.cdevents_lake
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
AND subject = 'taskrun'
ORDER BY __value

options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  LEAST(started_at, finished_at) AS at,
  subject_id AS subject_id,
  
  extract('epoch' from (finished_at - started_at)) AS run_duration,
  --
  last_payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' ->> 'url' AS url,
  outcome AS outcome
FROM cdviz.taskrun
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(finished_at)
  AND last_payload -> 'subject' -> 'content' ->> 'taskName' = ANY(ARRAY[${selected_value:sqlstring}]::text[])
  ORDER BY at DESC
  LIMIT $limit
